title: Getting fatal error when using PHPUnit 3.7.6 and Symfony 1.3.11
body:
When using phpunit with symfony 1.3.11 i'm getting the following error (PHP version: 5.3.10):

``` php
PHP Fatal error:  Cannot use object of type Closure as array in ic.platform/vendor/symfony1/lib/autoload/sfAutoloadAgain.class.php on line 72
PHP Stack trace:
PHP   1. {main}() /usr/bin/phpunit:0
PHP   2. PHPUnit_TextUI_Command::main() /usr/bin/phpunit:46
PHP   3. PHPUnit_TextUI_Command->run() /usr/share/php/PHPUnit/TextUI/Command.php:129
PHP   4. PHPUnit_TextUI_Command->handleArguments() /usr/share/php/PHPUnit/TextUI/Command.php:138
PHP   5. PHPUnit_TextUI_Command->handleBootstrap() /usr/share/php/PHPUnit/TextUI/Command.php:606
PHP   6. PHPUnit_Util_Fileloader::checkAndLoad() /usr/share/php/PHPUnit/TextUI/Command.php:778
PHP   7. PHPUnit_Util_Fileloader::load() /usr/share/php/PHPUnit/Util/Fileloader.php:76
PHP   8. include_once() /usr/share/php/PHPUnit/Util/Fileloader.php:92
PHP   9. BaseConfiguration::getApplicationConfiguration() /home/brecht/Documenten/workspace/ic.platform/tests/bootstrap.php:26
PHP  10. sfProjectConfiguration::getApplicationConfiguration() /home/brecht/Documenten/workspace/ic.platform/config/BaseConfiguration.class.php:92
PHP  11. sfApplicationConfiguration->__construct() /home/brecht/Documenten/workspace/ic.platform/vendor/symfony1/lib/config/sfProjectConfiguration.class.php:614
PHP  12. sfApplicationConfiguration->initConfiguration() /home/brecht/Documenten/workspace/ic.platform/vendor/symfony1/lib/config/sfApplicationConfiguration.class.php:51
PHP  13. sfApplicationConfiguration->initializePlugins() /home/brecht/Documenten/workspace/ic.platform/vendor/symfony1/lib/config/sfApplicationConfiguration.class.php:150
PHP  14. sfPropelPluginConfiguration->initialize() /home/brecht/Documenten/workspace/ic.platform/vendor/symfony1/lib/config/sfApplicationConfiguration.class.php:169
PHP  15. sfAutoload->autoload() /home/brecht/Documenten/workspace/ic.platform/vendor/symfony1/lib/config/sfApplicationConfiguration.class.php:0
PHP  16. sfAutoload->loadClass() /home/brecht/Documenten/workspace/ic.platform/vendor/symfony1/lib/autoload/sfAutoload.class.php:163
PHP  17. require() /home/brecht/Documenten/workspace/ic.platform/vendor/symfony1/lib/autoload/sfAutoload.class.php:188
PHP  18. sfAutoloadAgain->autoload() /home/brecht/Documenten/workspace/ic.platform/vendor/symfony1/lib/autoload/sfAutoload.class.php:0
```

When using PHPUnit version 3.6.11 i'm not getting this error.
